title: PBE Account
body: When I went to click on the link to sign up for an account, it said "something went wrong, please refresh the page and try again".  I saw on the board updates that it should be working... Any ideas?

replies.body: There is still sporadic issues now and then.  Give it some time and it should clear up for you to try again!
i am here pressing f5 + clicking on the check eligibility  for a hour and a half  straight its been 4 years i am waiting for this hope i will get in{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
